definition: handle or shaft (of an axe etc)/(of a flower, leaf or fruit) stem/sth that affords an advantage to an opponent/classifier for knives or blades

sentences.english: One of the heads of the beast seemed to have had a fatal wound, but the fatal wound had been healed.
sentences.chinese: 它在头一个兽面前，施行头一个兽所有的权柄。

sentences.english: Laws grind the poor, and rich men rule the law. (Oliver Goldsmith, British writer)
sentences.chinese: 法律吸吮穷人的膏血，而富人却掌握着权柄。

sentences.english: And he said unto them, Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣说，我也不告诉你们我仗着什么权柄作这些事。

sentences.english: Lk. 1:52 He has brought down potentates from thrones and has exalted the humble;
sentences.chinese: 路一52他叫有权柄的失位，叫卑微的升高。

sentences.english: The future belongs to the dandy. It is the exquisites who are going to rule.
sentences.chinese: 未来属于花花公子，而正是这些纨裤子弟将执掌权柄。

sentences.english: And they were astonished at his doctrine: for his word was with power.
sentences.chinese: 他们很希奇他的教训，因为他的话里有权柄。

sentences.english: These have one mind, and shall give their power and strength unto the beast.
sentences.chinese: 他们同心合意，将自己的能力权柄给那兽。

sentences.english: All actions of this congregation are to be carried out under his rule and authority.
sentences.chinese: 本堂会所有的行动必须在祂的管和权柄下执行。

sentences.english: From the top down, we must keep our focus on obeying Him and establishing His authority.
sentences.chinese: 由上而下，我们必须专注在顺服主并建造祂的权柄。

sentences.english: He even gives orders to evil spirits and they obey him.
sentences.chinese: 他用权柄吩咐污鬼，连污鬼也听从了他。

sentences.english: He teaches as one with authority.
sentences.chinese: 他是作为有权柄之人来教训的。

sentences.english: Because the country, power, the glory is yours.
sentences.chinese: 因为国度，权柄，荣耀全是你的。

sentences.english: These things speak, and exhort, and rebuke with all authority.
sentences.chinese: 这些事你要讲明，劝戒人，用各等权柄责备人。

sentences.english: What man can live and not see death, or save himself from the power of the grave ?
sentences.chinese: 谁能常活免死，救他的灵魂脱离阴间的权柄呢？

sentences.english: "Worthy is the lamb that was slain." Don't rush.
sentences.chinese: 曾被杀的羔羊，是配得权柄“，别抢节奏。

definition: to wield (political etc) power/be in power
to be in a position of power
